Policy.acknowledgement_statement:
Bria M. Coates is supported by NHLBI K08HL143127 and Manne Research Institute, Karen M. Ridge is supported by P01AG049665 and P01GM096971 and Alexander V. Misharin is supported by U19AI135964, P01AG049665, and R01HL153312.
For publications, written, and/or oral presentations resulting from use of this data, please cite the following information: “We would like to thank the Immune response to Life-Threatening Respiratory Infections in Children and Young Adults Investigators. The original data description for Immune response to Life-Threatening Respiratory Infections in Children and Young Adults can be found here: (Journal Citation __________)(PMID __________). The original data used for the analysis in this publication can be found in the NIH database of Genotypes and Phenotypes (dbGaP) under the accession number phs______.”
We will update the acknowledgment statement after the investigators submit the publication.
Policy.ic_specific_access_term: Use of this data is limited to health/medical/biomedical purposes, does not include the study of population origins or ancestry. Requestor must provide documentation of local IRB approval. Only full or expedited approvals are acceptable, and an ANNUAL IRB review is required base on the informed consents from the submitting institution. Requestor must provide a letter of collaboration with the primary study investigator(s).
